info.description:
WeebDex is an ad-free, scanlator-first online manga reader providing high-quality, zero-compression images.

Contact: [delta@weebdex.org](mailto:delta@weebdex.org) or join our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/syp3a6Eucq).

All API endpoints have a global rate limit of 5 requests per second per IP.
To avoid future issues, include the Origin: https://weebdex.org and Referer: https://weebdex.org/ headers when making API requests.

get.description: Returns only the most recent chapter of each manga. Use this endpoint if you don't want your feed to be filled with multiple chapters from the same manga.
